title: What would Discord going public mean for gaming's biggest communication platform?
full_text: What would Discord going public mean for gaming's biggest communication platform?. Earlier this week, reports indicated that big moves were happening at Discord. According to Bloomberg, the company responsible for gaming's most popular social platform had confidentially filed for IPO, indicating a major move towards going public. Read more.
